## MANDATORY CHECKLIST

Before ending your day, confirm:
- [ ] All session times logged with start/end
- [ ] All tasks marked complete or incomplete
- [ ] Category breakdown calculated
- [ ] Tomorrow's preparation noted
- [ ] Running log updated (`running-log.md`)
- [ ] Commits documented
- [ ] Any blockers clearly described

**DO NOT skip this checklist. This is a requirement for EVERY daily shutdown.**
